service.query: SELECT A.ORG_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME AS ORG_NAME , SUM(A.TOTAL) AS TOTAL , SUM(A.CASH_AMT) AS CASH_AMT , 0 AS CASH_CRATE , SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) AS JCARD_AMT , 0 AS JCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) AS OCARD_AMT , 0 AS OCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) AS DCARD_AMT , 0 AS DCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) AS CCARD_AMT , 0 AS CCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.POINT_AMT) AS POINT_AMT , 0 AS POINT_CRATE , SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS GIFT_DRAWL_AMT , 0 AS GIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) AS JGIFT_AMT , 0 AS JGIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT , 0 AS OGIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) AS CREDIT_SALE_AMT , 0 AS CREDIT_SALE_CRATE , SUM(A.GITA_AMT) AS GITA_AMT , 0 AS GITA_CRATE FROM ( SELECT A.PUMBUN_CD AS ORG_CD , A.STR_CD , ( SUM(A.CASH_AMT) + SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.POINT_AMT) + SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) + SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) + SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) + SUM(A.ALLIA_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.ENURI_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.CMS_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(JBOX_SALE_AMT) + SUM(INCEN_SALE_AMT) + SUM(ORD_SALE_AMT) + SUM(COD_SALE_AMT) - SUM(COD_CAN_AMT) + SUM(SPS_SALE_AMT) - SUM(SPS_CAN_AMT) + SUM(USE_SALE_AMT) - SUM(USE_CAN_AMT) + SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) + SUM(A.OKCASHBAG_AMT)) AS TOTAL , SUM(A.CASH_AMT) AS CASH_AMT , SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) AS JCARD_AMT , SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) AS OCARD_AMT , SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) AS DCARD_AMT , SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) AS CCARD_AMT , SUM(A.POINT_AMT) AS POINT_AMT , SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS GIFT_DRAWL_AMT , SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) AS JGIFT_AMT , SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT , SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) AS CREDIT_SALE_AMT , ( SUM(A.ALLIA_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.ENURI_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.CMS_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(JBOX_SALE_AMT) + SUM(INCEN_SALE_AMT) + SUM(ORD_SALE_AMT) + SUM(COD_SALE_AMT) - SUM(COD_CAN_AMT) + SUM(SPS_SALE_AMT) - SUM(SPS_CAN_AMT) + SUM(USE_SALE_AMT) - SUM(USE_CAN_AMT) + SUM(A.OKCASHBAG_AMT) + SUM(A.ETC_SALE_AMT) ) AS GITA_AMT FROM DPS.PS_DAYAPPRTYPE A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN C WHERE A.STR_CD=C.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD=C.PUMBUN_CD AND B.ORG_CD = C.SALE_ORG_CD AND B.STR_CD = ? AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.SALE_DT >= ? AND A.SALE_DT <= ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY A.PUMBUN_CD , A.STR_CD ) A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.ORG_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD GROUP BY A.ORG_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME ORDER BY A.ORG_CD

SELECT A.ORG_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME AS ORG_NAME , SUM(A.TOTAL) AS TOTAL , SUM(A.CASH_AMT) AS CASH_AMT , 0 AS CASH_CRATE , SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) AS JCARD_AMT , 0 AS JCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) AS OCARD_AMT , 0 AS OCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) AS DCARD_AMT , 0 AS DCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) AS CCARD_AMT , 0 AS CCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.POINT_AMT) AS POINT_AMT , 0 AS POINT_CRATE , SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS GIFT_DRAWL_AMT , 0 AS GIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) AS JGIFT_AMT , 0 AS JGIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT , 0 AS OGIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) AS CREDIT_SALE_AMT , 0 AS CREDIT_SALE_CRATE , SUM(A.GITA_AMT) AS GITA_AMT , 0 AS GITA_CRATE FROM ( SELECT A.PUMBUN_CD AS ORG_CD , A.STR_CD , ( SUM(A.CASH_AMT) + SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.POINT_AMT) + SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) + SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) + SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) + SUM(A.ALLIA_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.ENURI_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.CMS_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(JBOX_SALE_AMT) + SUM(INCEN_SALE_AMT) + SUM(ORD_SALE_AMT) + SUM(COD_SALE_AMT) - SUM(COD_CAN_AMT) + SUM(SPS_SALE_AMT) - SUM(SPS_CAN_AMT) + SUM(USE_SALE_AMT) - SUM(USE_CAN_AMT) + SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) + SUM(A.OKCASHBAG_AMT)) AS TOTAL , SUM(A.CASH_AMT) AS CASH_AMT , SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) AS JCARD_AMT , SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) AS OCARD_AMT , SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) AS DCARD_AMT , SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) AS CCARD_AMT , SUM(A.POINT_AMT) AS POINT_AMT , SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS GIFT_DRAWL_AMT , SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) AS JGIFT_AMT , SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT , SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) AS CREDIT_SALE_AMT , ( SUM(A.ALLIA_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.ENURI_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.CMS_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(JBOX_SALE_AMT) + SUM(INCEN_SALE_AMT) + SUM(ORD_SALE_AMT) + SUM(COD_SALE_AMT) - SUM(COD_CAN_AMT) + SUM(SPS_SALE_AMT) - SUM(SPS_CAN_AMT) + SUM(USE_SALE_AMT) - SUM(USE_CAN_AMT) + SUM(A.OKCASHBAG_AMT)+ SUM(A.ETC_SALE_AMT)) AS GITA_AMT FROM DPS.PS_DAYAPPRTYPE A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN C WHERE A.STR_CD=C.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD=C.PUMBUN_CD AND B.ORG_CD = C.BUY_ORG_CD AND B.STR_CD = ? AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.SALE_DT >= ? AND A.SALE_DT <= ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY A.PUMBUN_CD , A.STR_CD ) A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.ORG_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD GROUP BY A.ORG_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME ORDER BY A.ORG_CD

SELECT A.ORG_CD , B.ORG_SHORT_NAME AS ORG_NAME , SUM(A.TOTAL) AS TOTAL , SUM(A.CASH_AMT) AS CASH_AMT , 0 AS CASH_CRATE , SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) AS JCARD_AMT , 0 AS JCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) AS OCARD_AMT , 0 AS OCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) AS DCARD_AMT , 0 AS DCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) AS CCARD_AMT , 0 AS CCARD_CRATE , SUM(A.POINT_AMT) AS POINT_AMT , 0 AS POINT_CRATE , SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS GIFT_DRAWL_AMT , 0 AS GIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) AS JGIFT_AMT , 0 AS JGIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT , 0 AS OGIFT_CRATE , SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) AS CREDIT_SALE_AMT , 0 AS CREDIT_SALE_CRATE , SUM(A.GITA_AMT) AS GITA_AMT , 0 AS GITA_CRATE FROM ( SELECT LPAD(C.SALE_ORG_CD,8) || '00' AS ORG_CD , ( SUM(A.CASH_AMT) + SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) + SUM(A.POINT_AMT) + SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) + SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) + SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) + SUM(A.ALLIA_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.ENURI_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.CMS_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(JBOX_SALE_AMT) + SUM(INCEN_SALE_AMT) + SUM(ORD_SALE_AMT) + SUM(COD_SALE_AMT) - SUM(COD_CAN_AMT) + SUM(SPS_SALE_AMT) - SUM(SPS_CAN_AMT) + SUM(USE_SALE_AMT) - SUM(USE_CAN_AMT) + SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) + SUM(A.OKCASHBAG_AMT)) AS TOTAL , SUM(A.CASH_AMT) AS CASH_AMT , SUM(A.JCARD_AMT) AS JCARD_AMT , SUM(A.OCARD_AMT) AS OCARD_AMT , SUM(A.DCARD_AMT) AS DCARD_AMT , SUM(A.CCARD_AMT) AS CCARD_AMT , SUM(A.POINT_AMT) AS POINT_AMT , SUM(A.GIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS GIFT_DRAWL_AMT , SUM(A.JGIFT_AMT) AS JGIFT_AMT , SUM(A.OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT) AS OGIFT_DRAWL_AMT , SUM(A.CREDIT_SALE_AMT) AS CREDIT_SALE_AMT , ( SUM(A.ALLIA_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.ENURI_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(A.CMS_COUPON_AMT) + SUM(JBOX_SALE_AMT) + SUM(INCEN_SALE_AMT) + SUM(ORD_SALE_AMT) + SUM(COD_SALE_AMT) - SUM(COD_CAN_AMT) + SUM(SPS_SALE_AMT) - SUM(SPS_CAN_AMT) + SUM(USE_SALE_AMT) - SUM(USE_CAN_AMT) + SUM(A.OKCASHBAG_AMT)+ SUM(A.ETC_SALE_AMT)) AS GITA_AMT FROM DPS.PS_DAYAPPRTYPE A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN C WHERE A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = C.PUMBUN_CD AND B.ORG_CD = C.SALE_ORG_CD AND B.STR_CD = ?
